00049 class KVIRC_API KviKvsNumber
00050 {
00051         friend class KviKvsVariant;
00052 public:
00057         enum Type {
00058                 Real,     
00059                 Integer   
00060         };
00061 protected:
00066         union DataType {
00067                 kvs_int_t     iInt;
00068                 kvs_real_t    dReal;
00069         };
00070 protected:
00071         Type     m_type;
00072         DataType m_u;
00073 public:
00078         Type type() const { return m_type; };
00079 
00084         bool isReal() const { return m_type == Real; };
00085 
00090         bool isInteger() const { return m_type == Integer; };
00091 
00096         kvs_real_t real() const { return m_u.dReal; };
00097 
00102         kvs_int_t integer() const { return m_u.iInt; };
00103 };
00104 
00109 class KviKvsVariantData
00110 {
00111 public:
00116         enum Type {
00117                 Nothing = 0,    
00118                 String  = 1,    
00119                 Integer = 2,    
00120                 Real    = 4,    
00121                 Array   = 8,    
00122                 Hash    = 16,   
00123                 Boolean = 32,   
00124                 HObject = 64    
00125         };
00126 public:
00131         union DataType {
00132                 kvs_int_t       iInt;
00133                 kvs_real_t    * pReal;
00134                 QString       * pString;
00135                 KviKvsArray   * pArray;
00136                 KviKvsHash    * pHash;
00137                 bool            bBoolean;
00138                 kvs_hobject_t   hObject;
00139         };
00140 public:
00141         unsigned int m_uRefs;
00142         Type         m_eType;
00143         DataType     m_u;
00144 };
